synopsis.text:
Kinkaku Temple, a once tranquil sanctuary, now harbors the resurrected souls of ancient ninja who ruled Japan with their unyielding karate. In the technologically advanced dystopian metropolis of Neo-Saitama, these sinister ninja souls emerge from the shadows, wreaking havoc on the cybernetic society. Amidst the chaos, Kenji Fujikido, an ordinary salaryman, finds himself entangled in a deadly ninja turf war that claims the lives of his beloved wife and child.

In a near-death experience, Fujikido becomes the vessel for an enigmatic ninja soul known as Naraku Ninja. This possession transforms him into the formidable Ninja Slayer, a Grim Reaper with a singular purpose: to eradicate the evil ninja plaguing Neo-Saitama. Driven by vengeance, Ninja Slayer embarks on a personal crusade against the malevolent Soukai Syndicate ninjas, engaging in ruthless mortal combat.

As the dystopian underworld of Neo-Saitama becomes the battleground for Ninja Slayer's quest for retribution, the cyberpunk ninja action drama unfolds, promising a thrilling and suspenseful journey for viewers.
